about.title: About me
about.intro: My name is Daniel Oyola Moreno. I am a 20-year-old developer living in Badajoz, passionate about this field and eager to learn all kinds of technologies.
about.description: I have worked on frontend development with React, Angular and TypeScript, and I also have backend experience with Spring Boot. I love solving complex problems and learning new technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.problemSolvingDesc: Ability to analyze and solve complex problems efficiently.
skills.teamworkDesc: Effective collaboration with multidisciplinary teams and clear communication.
skills.learningDesc: Constantly updating knowledge of new technologies and best practices.
skills.timeManagementDesc: Effective organization and prioritization of tasks and projects.
skills.creativityDesc: Proposing innovative solutions and thinking outside the box.
skills.punctualityDesc: Commitment to deadlines and on-time delivery of projects.

titles.title: Obtained Titles
titles.smrDesc: Studies focused on the installation, configuration and maintenance of computer systems, local networks and internet services, with an emphasis on technical problem solving and computer security.
